Hello and welcome!

I am a postdoctoral researcher in the Department of Political Science, Aarhus University. My current research focuses on (a) the politics of climate change and climate policy and (b) the behavioral foundations and consequences of cross-national policy learning.

I did my graduate studies at the University of Essex and obtained my PhD in January 2024.

Thank you for visiting and please feel free to reach out to me.
